name: 先進光學顯微技術
goals: Understanding basic principles of advanced optical microscopy technologies
Knowing the contribution and the roles that advanced optical microscopies play in the progress of the contemporary science
syllabus:
Week 1 Introduction to optical microscopy  
Week 2-3 Confocal microscopy & derivative techniques  
Week 3-4 Confocal based super-resolution microscopies  
Week 5-6 Scanning probe microscopies  
Week 7-8 Reversible Saturable Optical Fluorescence Transitions (RESOLF) and applications  
Week 9-11 Single-molecule localization microscopies and single-molecule imaging  
Week 12-13 Structured illumination microscopy and wave front engineering  
Week 14-15 Light-sheet microscopy  
Week 16 Final term

第1週   光學顯微技術簡介  
第2-3週   共軛焦顯微術及衍生技術  
第3-4週   以共軛焦為基礎的超解析顯微術  
第5-6週   掃描探針顯微技術  
第7-8週   光學線性螢光躍遷顯微術與應用  
第9-11週 單分子定位顯微術與單分子影像  
第12-13週 結構照明顯微術與光波前工程  
第14-15週 層光顯微術  
第16週    期末考

methodologies.note:
Concepts and principles of advanced optical microscopy technologies will be introduced in the lecture.
先進光學顯微術的重要概念與原理將會於課堂中逐一介紹。

Important applications related to the topics will be covered in the class. Students are encouraged to ask questions and discuss the advantages and limitations with each other. 
與當週教學主題有關的重要應用會被選擇出做為課堂內的討論內容，學生會被鼓勵提出問題，並且透過彼此討論的方式理解技術的優勢與限制性。

During the semester, the students will choose a topic from recently published research papers and share his/her own opinions from studying this paper.
學生在一學期中必須選擇一篇相關的文獻進行閱讀，並將自我學習的心得於課堂中分享。

grading.note:
The students will need to write a report based on their study of the research paper for the oral presentation. The report should include three chapters: introduction, discussion, and conclusion. The words count should not be less than 500 words and the report should be written in English. 

學生必須完成一篇基於他們口頭報告內容的書面報告，報告須以英文寫成，並且包含三個章節，分別為導論、討論與結論，報告的字數必須超過500字

The final exam will be in an open book fashioned. The range includes all the topics appeared in the lecture. 

期末考將會以開書考的形式進行，內容包括當學期課程的全部主題。

The students will be asked to present a research paper that is related to the advanced microscopy technology. The presentation should include a brief introduction to the research and his/her own comment/discoveries through the studying. The length of the presentation should not exceed 10 minutes.

學生將被要求報告一篇與先進光學顯微術有關的論文，報告內容除了對於內容簡短的介紹外，還必須包括他個人的發現與看法，報告的時間以10分鐘為限。
